testcase.name: Create Vmail and verify the Same
testcase.system-out: Given User is in login vital engine portal..................................passed When User enters valid username and password................................passed And Click on submit button..................................................passed And User click on new button present in homepage............................passed And User add new receiving team and add participants........................passed And User adds subject,tags and image........................................passed And User upload file and medical records....................................passed Then Click on create Vmail..................................................passed And Verify the Subject present in header....................................passed
